description: Ext2Read is an explorer like utility to explore ext2/ext3/ext4 files. It now supports LVM2 and EXT4 extents. It can be used to view and copy files and folders. It can recursively copy entire folders.
summary: Read Ext2/Ext3/Ext4 filesystems. Write Ext2/Ext3 filesystems.
author: Manish Regmi
